entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a setting to only use IDE0180 Use tuple swap if it will avoid extra temps #65815
  • In vs2022, the c# code format around #if/#endif fails to handle mixed line endings #65806
  • VSCode tasks are broken #65803
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException while renaming #65798
  • SolutionState should enforce changes to a document happen to all links of that document atomically. #65797

Closed

  • Inconsistency between `!= null` and `is not null` on NRTs #65740
  • .net 7.0 PublishAot will destroy the Source generators code #65801

PullRequests

Created

  • Add 17.6-vs-deps branch to config #65821
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure we recompute top level semantic versions, even when making frozen documents #65820
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Use lower logging level for verbose messages #65819
    Area-IDE
  • Fix inline rename in MAUI #65818
    Area-IDE
  • Skip tests on 32bit debug due to messagepack issue #65817
    Area-IDE
  • Atomically update all linked files in a solution snapshot when one of them is updated. #65816
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify GlobalKeywordRecommender #65814
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Refactor snippets #65811
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Stop referencing packages that became inbox on modern .NET. #65810
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Ensure lvalue struct receivers are not copied by value implicit Range indexer rewrite #65805
    Area-Compilers
  • Use `dotnet` instead of `.dotnet/dotnet` in VSCode tasks #65804
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Delete Compilers.sln and keep only Compilers.slnf #65802
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Remove options that have the same editorconfig name #65800
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65795
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Make main-vs-deps PRs non-draft #65791
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Link compiler analysis scope to solution-specific override #65813
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Extract a few more interfaces from the VS layer project system #65799
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused method #65785
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] Find refs - Remove bogus assert and add test #65675
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Cleanup redundant NeitherNull methods #65807
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Remove unused methods #65782
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move to using ToListAndFree in more places in the parser. #65708
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Implement parsing changes for Primary Constructors feature #65720
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #65642
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65822
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to more consistent patterns in the parser. #65724
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65786
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • reduce the amount of time that we switch from a background thread to … #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecessary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • WIP: Share syntax trees across linked files. #65793
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Always cache our lazy values. #65719
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify WeaklyCachedRecoverableValueSource #65717
    Area-IDE
  • Allow optional and `params` parameters in synthesized delegate templates #65582
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit `DecimalConstantAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Update few completion tests #65490
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Cleanup unused generated code #65723
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add new API to easily tell if a node contains conditional preprocessor directives (without allocations). #65794
    Area-Compilers
  • Add more test scenarios for symbol completion after scoped #65747
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Adding support for positional patterns to GenerateDeconstructMethodFixProvider.cs #65748
    Area-IDE, Community
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Force arrow cursor for inline rename flayout #65783
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow multiline override #65395
    Area-IDE, Community
